heading: HB01188
0: AN ACT RECONSTITUTING THE LANAO DEL NORTE ENGINEERING DISTRICT OFFICES IN THE PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE INTO TWO (2) REGULAR DISTRICT ENGINEERING OFFICES TO BE KNOWN AS THE LANAO DEL NORTE FIRST ENGINEERING DISTRICT AND THE LANAO DEL NORTE SECOND DISTRICT ENGINEERING OFFICE TO BE BASED IN THE FIRST AND SECOND CONGRESSIONAL DISTRICTS OF LANAO DEL NORTE, RESPECTIVELY, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2017-05-02, transmitted to the Senate on 2017-05-04 and received by the Senate on 2017-05-04 Substituted by HB05078

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01188
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RECONSTITUTING THE LANAO DEL NORTE ENGINEERING DISTRICT OFFICES IN THE PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE INTO TWO (2) REGULAR DISTRICT ENGINEERING OFFICES TO BE KNOWN AS THE LANAO DEL NORTE FIRST ENGINEERING DISTRICT AND THE LANAO DEL NORTE SECOND DISTRICT ENGINEERING OFFICE TO BE BASED IN THE FIRST AND SECOND CONGRESSIONAL DISTRICTS OF LANAO DEL NORTE, RESPECTIVELY, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
